import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { trackButtonClick } from '../utils/analytics'; import { portfolioData } from '../data/portfolioData'; const PortfolioPage = () => { const [filter, setFilter] = useState('*'); const handleFilterChange = (newFilter) => { setFilter(newFilter); }; const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleProjectClick = (projectId) => { // Navigate within SPA to portfolio details section navigate(`/portfolio/${projectId}`); trackButtonClick(`Portfolio Details - Project ${projectId}`, 'Portfolio'); }; return ( <> {/* Local styles for clickable portfolio entries */}

Portfolio

  1. Home
  2. Portfolio
{/* Section Title */}

Portfolio

Check Our Portfolio
{/* End Section Title */}
  • handleFilterChange('*')}> All Projects
  • handleFilterChange('.filter-ui')}> UI/UX
  • handleFilterChange('.filter-development')}> Development
  • handleFilterChange('.filter-photography')}> Photography
  • handleFilterChange('.filter-marketing')}> Marketing
handleProjectClick(1)}>
{/* End Portfolio Item */}

); }; export default PortfolioPage;
